name: Freshpet, Inc.
description: Freshpet, Inc. is a leading pet food company focused on providing fresh, all-natural pet food made from high-quality ingredients. Founded in 2006 and headquartered in Secaucus, New Jersey, Freshpet aims to revolutionize the pet food industry by offering refrigerated food products that are as nutritious as they are delicious. The company believes that pets deserve the same quality of food that humans enjoy, which is why it uses real meat, vegetables, and fruits in its formulations, without any preservatives or artificial ingredients. Freshpet’s product offerings include a variety of recipes tailored for dogs and cats, available in both rolls and bags. With a commitment to transparency, Freshpet lists all its ingredients on the packaging, ensuring customers know exactly what they are feeding their pets. The company is dedicated to sustainability, utilizing eco-friendly packaging and working towards reducing its carbon footprint. As pet ownership continues to rise, Freshpet is well-positioned to meet the growing demand for healthy and fresh pet food options. The company is experiencing rapid growth and expanding its distribution channels, making its products more accessible to pet owners across North America.

seo.meta_title: Freshpet, Inc. | Fresh and Natural Pet Food
seo.meta_description: Discover Freshpet, Inc., a leader in fresh pet food made from real ingredients. Learn about our commitment to quality, health, and sustainability for your pets.

faq.question: What type of food does Freshpet offer?
faq.answer: Freshpet offers fresh, all-natural pet food for dogs and cats made from high-quality ingredients.

faq.question: Where is Freshpet headquartered?
faq.answer: Freshpet is headquartered in Secaucus, New Jersey, USA.

faq.question: What is Freshpet's commitment to sustainability?
faq.answer: Freshpet is committed to sustainability through eco-friendly packaging and reducing its carbon footprint.
